### Market Notice

This procurement is open to all qualified suppliers who are willing to provide audit support services for the Canadian Energy Regulator.

### Goods and Services

The Provider is requested to provide internal audit services to ensure that the CER Chief Financial Officer’s (CFO’s) financial transaction controls, specifically Sections 32, 33 and 34 of the Financial Administration Act, continue to perform as expected.

### Government Contract Agreements

The contract is covered by the following trade agreements:

*   Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement
*   Canadian-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement
*   World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement
*   Canadian Free Trade Agreement

### Geographic Scope

This solicitation is open to suppliers who can deliver their goods and services in the following regions:

*   Canada

### Delivery Location

This solicitation is open to suppliers who can deliver their goods and services in the following region:

*   Alberta
